pages.text: With an $(item)Architect's Sawbench$() you can make various shapes from your blocks to help accent your builds.$(br2)With most of the shapes, you can place $(item)Cladding$() (from the 'Other' tab of the sawbench) to have a secondary texture on some faces.$(br2)$(item)Window$() shapes can have $(item)Glass Panes$() added after placing.

pages.title: Architect's Sawbench
pages.text: Input the blocks you want to shape in the top left, and select which shape you want. Different shapes give different amounts per block used.

pages.title: Architect's Hammer
pages.text: Right Click to rotate a shape around it's $(thing)Vertical Axis$(). Shift-Right Click to Change shape orientation.

pages.title: Architect's Chisel
pages.text: Right Click to disable/re-enable connections between shape blocks. Can remove $(item)Cladding$()from shape blocks, and $(item)Panes$() from $(item)Window$() shapes. $(br)Can also be used to harvest vanilla $(item)Glass$(), $(item)Glass Panes$(), $(item)Glowstone$() and $(item)Ice$() akin to Silk Touch.
